props.continuous: If true, window will "wrap around" from the last item to the first, and from the first item to the last
props.nextIcon: Icon used for the "next" button if `ShowArrows` is true
props.prevIcon: Icon used for the "prev" button if `ShowArrows` is true
props.showArrowsOnHover: Display the "next" and "prev" buttons on hover. `ShowArrows` MUST ALSO be set.
props.value: The designated model value for the component.
props.values: The designated model value for the component.
props.vertical: Uses a vertical transition when changing windows.
